text: Francisco Javier Aguilar García ( 26 March 1949 – 11 May 2020) was a Spanish professional footballer. He played as a forward. He was born in Santander, Spain. He played for the national team from 1971 to 1973. From 1971 to 1979, he played for Real Madrid. Aguilar died on 11 May 2020 in Madrid at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Madridista stats Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish footballers
title: Ico Aguilar
